title: Sadhguru: The Truth about Karma, Identity & Purpose EP 1117
description:
“What happened yesterday you cannot change, what is happening today you can only experience.”

Today's guest is yogi, mystic, and visionary, Sadhguru. Named one of India’s 50 most influential people, Sadhguru’s work has touched the lives of millions worldwide through his transformational programs. He is an internationally renowned speaker and author of New York Times Bestsellers, Inner Engineering: A Yogi’s Guide to Joy and Karma: A Yogi’s Guide to Crafting Your Destiny. Dedicated to the physical, mental and spiritual wellbeing of humanity, Sadhguru possesses a perspective on life and living that never fails to intrigue, challenge, and surprise all those he encounters.

In this episode Lewis and Sadhguru discuss karma and how it affects us everyday, why we shouldn’t be worried about getting rid of waste in our life, the evil of limited identity, why we need to redefine abundance in our lives, the problem with “being in the moment.”, and so much more!

For more go to: www.lewishowes.com/1117

Check out his website: isha.sadhguru.org/us/en

Check out his book: Karma: A Yogi's Guide To Crafting Your Destiny
